item.title: Coup leader seeks win in first vote since Gabon army takeover
item.description: About one million voters are set to pick their next president from a list of eight hopefuls.

item.title: Witkoff meets Putin as Trump urges Russia to 'get moving' on Ukraine ceasefire
item.description: The US envoy holds a third round of talks with the Russian president as agreement on a truce remains elusive.

item.title: Judge allows Columbia graduate Mahmoud Khalil's deportation
item.description: Mahmoud Khalil was arrested in March for his role in pro-Palestinian protests at Columbia University.

item.title: Trump to end protected status for Afghans and Cameroonians
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem found the conditions in both countries no longer merited US protections, a statement says.

item.title: Supreme Court rules Trump officials must 'facilitate' release of man deported to El Salvador
item.description: The government has said Kilmar Abrego Garcia was deported in error, but has resisted returning him to the US.
